title: Vagrant to the rescue
content:
Anything that starts with a "V" is exciting, according to some. Ok, according to V.

We created a [Vagrant](https://www.vagrantup.com/) setup for TUI Hackfridays, including multiple branches for project setups.
This will (hopefully!!) allow us to save some dear hacking time in the process.

You can find it here:
https://github.com/Cloudoki/Hackbox/tree/master


Happy Hacking!
